amendment.description: To establish citizen's service protection advocates, to require the Strategic Advisory Commission on Postal Service Solvency and Innovation to study the advisability of the Postal Service entering into inter-agency agreements with respect to post offices, and to require the Postal Service to develop a strategic plan for entering into such inter-agency agreements.

action.text: Amendment SA 2047 proposed by Senator Bennet to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2047 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
